issue.title: Pelvis vs Foot Orientation after teleport

content.raw:
> TBH doesn't seem like an issue that we have to start facing 12 days before the finals.

Teleportation has been released months ago, other teams had already picked up on this issue and started addressing it, see issue #119 for example, which was ticketed exactly 2 months ago.

> the first step will be alright, but once the world drifts, the second footstep will end up anywhere

Drift sounds like a problem you'd have regardless of teleportation, and would be also present on the real robot, where you don't have access to the ground truth.
